Token.Abstract: The selectors which would need to be exported by an object wishing to replace the built in ArcaObjectFactory
Creates or overwrites the objects represented in the source data.

Parameter.Name: sourceData
Parameter.Abstract: The array or dictionary that contains the source (i.e. parsed JSON data from a server)

Parameter.Name: objectClass
Parameter.Abstract: The class of the objects at the top level of the collection (person, in the example from discussion)

Parameter.Name: context
Parameter.Abstract: The NSManagedObjectContext that will be used to create/retrieve the objects

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: Any errors that occur will be populated to this address

ReturnValue.Abstract: The array of objects that were created or retrieved
